website_summaries.verdict: Packed with 300 LEDs. Amazingly low price. We suggest buying a compatible adapter with proper clips.
pros: Easy installation with tape or other adhesives
cons: Does not include AC power transformer
Different strands may not match each other
Bulb failure is a common complaint

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy, under cabinet lighting
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these 5 stars even though the adhesive isn't perfectly holding them under my cabinets. For the price you can't beat these, and the light is a nice bright white, not blue-ish. It really made our kitchen look better, and was super easy to install, just be prepared to have to add a little tape if needed. Also the included splices made it easy to run the 22ft section I needed. I used this power supply:  and this RF remote:  and its awesome. You can't beat under cabinet lighting for $22 and less than an hour of work. I will probably use these lights in my workshop to add some light
customer_reviews.author: The Longs

customer_reviews.title: DIY lighted movie poster frame
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these LEDs. I used them to make my own illuminated movie poster frame. These LEDs are nice and bright and performed just as I had hoped for this project. The frame is 41"x28" and all LEDs in the package were used. Worked out because I only wanted the "light side" lit. You will need two packages to do a complete frame.
customer_reviews.author: TheAmazonSavage

customer_reviews.title: Light up mirror
customer_reviews.text: They work and are certainly bright. I bought the lights, remote & power adapter. I put them on a mirror I bought from TJ Maxx. No problems, easy installation and now I have my own light up mirror for my makeup in the mornings. I got the courage to do this lighting project after watching a few youtube videos. Here is my results.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price!! Good way to add to light to your car without blinding you. One roll goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: John hess

customer_reviews.title: Nice while they lasted but...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for not even a month and they are already flickering to the point where I can't use them anymore. I tried to unplug various pieces and plug them back in hoping it was just a loose connection but I think these are just already dead. Very disappointing because I liked them when they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lunzer

customer_reviews.title: FOR VANITY USE
customer_reviews.text: BEST LIGHTING EVER. I wanted a vanity, but was not looking forward to paying $200-$500, just for a mirror with lights. The adhesive on the LED lights stick very well on the glass of my mirror and I have NEVER seen my face so clearly before. You do NEED TO BUY the recommended power supply to actually make them light up, but the remote isn't necessary unless you like the idea of having a remote to adjust brightness. In love with this product and now have 4 friends that are going to buy.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked 100% out of the box. Had to buy extra connectors for my 90 degree turns but I'm very happy with them. Connected them to a light switch to turn on/off whenever we need them. Had to purchase power supply adapter and cords to feed it to the pantry n other Cabients but it came out perfect. I also used 3m two way tape to stick to the bottom because they do get a lil hot even though they are LED n they have adhesive on the back side
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: LE 16.4 ft LED Flexible Light Strip 300
customer_reviews.text: Update: I installed the lights successfully and used them several times. They worked great! Last week they quit!! Nothing works! I checked all the connections, the remote, which I installed a new battery - NOTHING! I would not not recommend this light strip obviously. It takes ALOT of time to install these and then they quit. Very frustrating!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki, MN

customer_reviews.title: the best part; these lights are worth every single penny
customer_reviews.text: Came in less time than expected. However, the best part; these lights are worth every single penny. Best purchase I've made in a long time. I had a very difficult time finding lighting for my vanity that was reasonably priced as well as doable for someone who has no electrical skills. If your thinking led lights, this is the way to go!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy w

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this light strip. I used it to wrap my mirror and my standing jewelry mirrior. I sell makeup so I have to have good lighting for my selfies. I like the fact that they give u extra pieces to make a whole new light strip. Just don't forget to order a power cord.
customer_reviews.author: aelsas

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Giving it all one star because a separate adapter is needed. Got it today excited to hang them up and I can’t. Thought I was saving money but after I buy all necessary pieces it will be same amount as a local purchase. It’s like buying a laptop and purchasing the power supply separately. Put it in the drop down arrow and bundle it as a pack.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna J. Alva

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 24 Hours. AVOID.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these but sadly half the strip stopped working after 24 hours. Spent nearly 2 hours installing the lights only to have them fail on me. Embarrassing to have to go back to the clients place and redo all of the work. I’m using the correct power supply so it’s a build quality issue. Will be sending back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: nydesign123

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing (but edited)
customer_reviews.text: These turned out, not nearly as bright as expected, but that wasn't the worst part. The intensity and color spectrum diminished the further away you got from the transformer. In other words, the strip is not consistent, and wanes toward the end. UPDATE: I am extremely impressed that I was contacted by the company, that was so concerned with customer satisfaction, they sent a replacement because I was disappointed. I have yet to use the product, but based on customer service they deserve an upgrade. When I use this product, I could consider 5 stars if it meets my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Alan S. Broner

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed - they do NOT stick!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our son's 1st year of college dorm room - helped him and his roommate put them all the way around the top of their room ceiling - with a neat little convenient button switch next to their beds to turn them off and on as desired. Sadly, they didn't even last ONE day....he came home from dinner that night and they had already fallen off the wall! So excited....to end up sooooo disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Kimba-CO

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these light strips. I buy them in the daylight white because they are a truer white. I've purchase the warm white in the same brand, but they had an off yellow cast that I didn't like. I'll be buying more of these to out under cabinet toe-kicks and beds for night lights. I use a 12vdc adapter from my old Linksys access point and it works perfectly. I also like that this also comes with additional splice clips. The adhesive also is great too, it hasn't come off anything that I've put it in so far (mostly 2x4's, plywood and painted surfaces)
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice strip lights, easy to install and quite bright!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to light an Ikea Detolf display case. One reel is enough to extend across the bottom, sides and top in a continuous loop, plus some extra length that can be easily cut off with a pair of scissors on the designated cut line (after every 3rd LED). This particular set comes with two reels which was enough to light two cases. These lights were extremely easy to install, the adhesive sticks really well to glass. And with the suggested transformer it was all plug-and-play. The lights are nice and bright and perfect for lighting the display case.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Wright III

customer_reviews.title: Best LED Lighting Option
customer_reviews.text: I am OBSESSED with these lights. I have purchased multiple sets and have used them in many ways. I love how flexible they are. I had a vanity I NEVER used because I didn't have the right lighting for it. Now that I attached these lights to my vanity I couldn't imagine doing it any other way. I take pics and do videos for my business and pure white light is best. I was also able to create a ring light with these lights that attaches to my tripod. I totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Turned yellow
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for under cabinet lighting in my kitchen they look good but I've had them up about 2 years the rubber that in cases the led and strip electronics have turned yellow... NO one smokes in the house... It's inside and not exposed to sunlight... They just turned yellow on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dez

customer_reviews.title: LEDs under bed
customer_reviews.text: Great lights, I put these lights under my bed to light up my room at night. Color wise these LEDs are 5000K. If your looking for blinding brightness these are nowhere strong enough but I would say these are good for bedrooms or any areas you just want to light up.
customer_reviews.author: Shamwow

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT and cheap
customer_reviews.text: This makes the third order of these that I've placed. I bought them to add some lighting to my walk in closet that I'm building. The color of these is definitely daylight white and looks brilliant. I would say it's in the 4000k range. The LEDs are SMD 2835 which are brighter and more efficient than most other LEDs out there. The picture I've uploaded is just one strip slapped on top of my cabinets. I'll try to remember to come back and post more pictures once all of the lights are put up. If I ever need more LED strips in the future, I'll be back for more of these.
customer_reviews.author: thirtyfiftyoneTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well to metal
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning - the adhesive on the back of the lights does NOT stick well to metal. I cleaned the metal with soap and water and then acetone. Applied the lights and when I checked in the morning - all the lights had peeled away from the metal. I just purchased 100 micro magnets to make sure that the light strip remains on the metal.
customer_reviews.author: desert rat

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Was defective on arrival. There was a continuity break on the positive side that resulted in the illumination of about the first 10% of the bulbs. The rest were off. I used my multimeter to identify where the break was and soldered-in a jumper to bypass the break and complete the circuit. Since I typically buy these with the idea of cutting them up and soldering the segments together to build video lights, applying the fix was no big deal. But it was extra work that I should not have needed to do.
customer_reviews.author: AmpMechanic

customer_reviews.title: Really nice strip lights
customer_reviews.text: I used these strip lights to repair my wife's make up mirror. It originally had a round flourescent tube inside but I removed all that and replaced it using most of the strip lights and a power brick salvaged from an old router. The light quality is really great. Perfect daylight color temperature with no bluish cast whatsoever. I selfishly saved a couple feet to light up my computer desk. These are very bright! The tape was very sticky and was 3M brand so it should last well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Very delicate
customer_reviews.text: I've bought LED strip lights before and they always were imbedded in a silicone shell. I didn't realize exactly what I was getting on this one. This is a hugely bright and cheap LED strip light. Nice connector on one end, wires for connection on the other end. Note that "non-waterproof" means that there is no silicone cover of any kind on the strip, just the naked circuit strip. So, unwind it twice and the circuit strip starts tearing. Its very delicate. So I give it 5 stars for bright and price, 1 star for delicate and average it to 3. Not sure I can get it mounted on the ceiling of my shed before it rips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More than enough LED lights to do your average kitchen and add that little pop to them
customer_reviews.text: Bright white lights that I was able to mount under my new kitchen cabinets with no major issues * Adhesive on the under side of the LED lights sticks very well *** Be careful when you apply these lights as the adhesive is not very forgiving if you have to reapply * Lights are very low profile and blend-in with the underside of your cabinet * 16+ feet is more than enough lights to do your average kitchen
customer_reviews.author: PohakurockTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the product, it is very difficult to install it. It does not have the cable that directly connects to the electric current, which makes an ordinary person very difficult to install it. I hope to buy nothing from this seller until I receive a reply.
customer_reviews.author: keny tiago barbosa vicente lopes

customer_reviews.title: You can bend or cut!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure about purchasing these for my vanity due to my mirror it isn't the average kind, it has curves within the mirror. I am so glad I purchased these. They worked perfectly. You can bend/cut etc. Also they was way brighter than I expected! Love them. I would recommend these to anyone. Edited* as you can now see my photo, you can see how flexible these are. Also over a month later they're just as fabulous as when I put them on! They're very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Renee

customer_reviews.title: great flexible lighting solution
customer_reviews.text: needed some under counter lighting and these worked perfectly. Simple to install, get the lenght you need and cut (at appropriate spot- indicated in directions). Remove adheasive and stick. I did do a quick wipe down first, I'm sure it's recommended to actually the surface, but a wipe seemed to work fine. This stick great and most important that provide a great amount of light. I have these on a smart switch, so they go on automatically. They provide great light and look fantastic. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: viperamd64

customer_reviews.title: Great inside gunsafe
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Installed this LED light strip inside a gunsafe. The lights turn on the second the door cracks open. There is 3M adhesive on the back so I just stuck it to the edge of the door frame of the safe. No complaints yet! All my friends were astonished when they saw it. Paired with:
customer_reviews.author: Chunk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks beautiful! I highly recommend these to anyone looking to add 12volt lighting to a camper, motorhome or enclosed trailer. Nice bright light but doesn't blind you.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT UP ALL THE THINGS!
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. Cheap and bright. Put up a whole spool for under cabinet lighting. Works very nice! I am looking for more places to put them much to my wife's dismay. Make sure to get a power supply of some sort to power these as nothing comes in the box (12V DC). The lights are also dimmable which is a plus until you go looking for a DC only wall dimmer switch. I bought a can of 3M Super 77 multipurpose spray adhesive as the stuff on the back of the is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Reply Hazy Try Again

customer_reviews.title: Try mounting on aluminum strips before
customer_reviews.text: It works, all that I could have asked for. I mounted them on aluminum strips from Lowes as a way to avoid the need to clean years of accumulated goo on the bottom of my cabinets. I recommend doing that as opposed to the amazingly difficult job of getting a workably clean surface. Get the 1/2” x 4 foot strips, erasure the and cut the M to fit your cabinets. As a side benefit the aluminum will dissipate heat which is the enemy of led longevity!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Witt

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Cannot link additional strips. Instructions state do not link more than 5m per power adaptor.....why sell additional links and connectors if you can't connect them. Sending them back. Highly displeased with only half a project done.
customer_reviews.author: AMccook

customer_reviews.title: A perfect combination for lighting my gun safe.
customer_reviews.text: These three products work perfectly together so that when I open my gun safe, the lights come on:
customer_reviews.author: jndcarl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED lighting and so easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome LED lighting and so easy to install. I installed the LED light strip in my hallway closet with the Sensky automatic cabinet sensor switch so the lights come on when the door opens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I could not stop starring at my vanity table once I put on the lights, it was very simple & easy to put on. Definitely worth it! Also very cheap, which is a plus 👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Summer Kim

customer_reviews.title: Can't use it without an extra expense of a plug in
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissapointed to find that this item did not come with a plug in. After receiving it I checked the description WAY below the item to find out where it stated that fact. I would assume that a string of lights would come ready to use! The misnomer should be next to the photo!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: I used these strips to make a Bed Light for my Ender3 3d printer and a soldering area light for my desk. The print bed one has been running non-stop now for 4 days and is still going strong. The soldering station setup is 2 strips in parallel and produces really good light to solder with. Didnt use the supplied joiners yet because my requirements have required soldered connections to the strips. Looking at the design, they seem useful in larger deployments than what I'm currently using it for.
customer_reviews.author: D.McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: They are VERY BRIGHT, Adhesion is horrible though
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, adhesive is horrible you may need to buy adhesives separately. Lights are not perfect they go on and off when using may be a connection problem. You will have to buy adaptor, connectors, switch to turn on and off and other parts separately depending on what you are buy these for, these are simply the whites led strip itself. Roll Is also so short used it up so fast (importantly to do measurements how much inches you’ll need first for your project before buying)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lights are fine, but the sticky tape is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: As others have already said, the double sided tape on these is low quality and doesn't stick well. Absolutely no chance of sticking to my glass display case shelves (which I have 24 shelves that multiple sets these lights are being mounting to) so I am now having to buy reliable 3M tape to get these lights to hold. The added price for the replacement tape now makes each strip light cost more then planned. $9 for the strip, $12 for the power supply and now $9 for 5 meters of 3M tape brings these to $30 per setup.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Uneven brightness
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. I used it to replace the light under wall cabinet in my kitchen. It is brighter then I thought, I brought two for it but only used one. The reason for only 3 stars is because the brightness is not even. LED's become dimmer towards end of the strip. There are 2v drop, 12v in the head and 10v in the tail. I then measured the resistance of the line. It's about 100ohm, which is way too high and that's the reason of uneven brightness. For that length, the resistance should not be measurable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Provides Excellent Illumination!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. CONS: I bought 2: one was perfect and second one had TWO soldering points which means this strip was shorter and they put together 3 pieces. PRO: Provides very good light! I installed one in the kitchen and other on my wife's dressing table and she loves it! Please keep in mind that you may need T or L connectors. Also a switch and power supply. The power supply is mandatory if you don't have any, since is not included.
customer_reviews.author: JARELLANO

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lights. Bought them to illuminate the interior of my new 6'x12' cargo trailer and Wow! these things light it up brighter than daylight. I bought two sets and stuck them to the ceiling using the adhesive backing that comes on the light strips. Hooked them up to my 12V battery and switch. Had to cut off a couple of feet at the end due to the length of the trailer but the cutting spots are clearly marked and easily cut. Much less expensive and better than what I could find at any local store. Highly recommend these lights to anyone looking for this type of lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Paintball Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive LED light strip
customer_reviews.text: These lights have been in for nearly 2 years. They work well and are bright. I bought some mounting clips because some sections didn't adhere well. I cleaned the surfaces first, but they may still have some residue from cooking so I can't say for sure if it's the fault of the lights. This was a light strip only, didn't come with power supply or control.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are awesome!! I used them around my vanity for the perfect lighting! So easy to put up. I bought the remote adapter to turn off and on and would defiantly recommend if you are buying these lights. There is a lot of different settings and helps adjust the lights. They are bright!! I recommend these for anything you want that extra light around!!
customer_reviews.author: J Lynn

customer_reviews.title: oops not ledmo
customer_reviews.text: I used to use these alot and then I started buying ledmo products. These aren't as bright even in the same category. All the strip lighting that I've used have poor adhesion so I use 100% silicone and clips anyway but the brightness isn't as good. These still work fairly compatible to what I like and I caught a sale but I didn't read well and got wrong company.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Holliday

customer_reviews.title: SO AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: These are THE absolute COOLEST thing ever. I just look at them and marvel at what a cool product they are! I have a booth at an antique shop in town where I sell products, and they provided the shelving units, but they were VERY deep and dark, painted dark brown, so it was really difficult to show off my items! You can see what a difference the lights make, I have included pictures. They were so easy to install, and I just love them. I want to put them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: srenaudTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: WHERES THE ADAPTER!?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and was excited to put them up however the power adapter apparently wasn’t included and I wasn’t prompted to add it to my order upon purchase. Now I have to wait even longer to set up my lights because it came without an adapter which is stupid. It should come with one. I’m not knowledgeable in electricity so I can hard wire it myself. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Lorin

customer_reviews.title: Economical, easy to install LED strip
customer_reviews.text: The "LE 16.4ft LED Flexible Light Strip, 300 Units SMD 2835 LEDs, 12V DC Non-waterproof" is economical and very easy to install. It has self-adhesive backing which comes in handy during installation, I still used a double-sided tape for every foot to ensure that it will stay in place. It comes with extra 3 Strip connectors and 1 DC cable, the LED strip itself already comes with DC cable on one end and bare wires on the other. I installed this behind a top shelf and underneath a desk shelf - helps in reducing eye strain for those long computer sessions.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: These didn't come with a controller - just the LEDs. They're fantastic! I bought them to replace an rgb strip I had under my kitchen cabinets. The old ones were so dim and the white was...you could tell it was rgb. They at least had a decent wifi controller, so I soldered these new ones to the old controller and they're working great. Very bright and match the 5000k lights in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Beware of SALE items.
customer_reviews.text: LEDs work although the 2835 series are not that bright even when doubled or tripled. Adhesive backing comes completely off not leaving the stay strip so you may have to glue them....doesn't really hold that well anyway. The connectors they give do not work AT ALL. I had to use jumpers to series two strips together . Overall very disappointed but you get what you pay for from these companies.
customer_reviews.author: TK Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH PLUG!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT COME WITH PLUG!!! Read description carefully. This is unusable without additional parts.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: It brightened up kitchen like you wouldn't believe
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, I installed LED Strip lights under my kitchen cabinets, removed a florescent fixture, running the wire from there to a new receptacle installed inside the cabinets so was able to use the same switch for strip lights. Neat, as it allowed me to run lights inside as well as outside the cabinets... something I plan on doing with this latest purchase. I purchased LE strip lights for indirect lights mounted in cove molding, which I installed about 9" below ceiling. It brightened up kitchen like you wouldn't believe...
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Nice & Bright
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit that I was skeptical buying these because of the cost. Turns out, i’m really happy with them. The adhesive was my biggest worry, but it’s actually not bad at all. I installed this in the cargo portion of my service van to supplement to one rinky dink incandescant overhead light that is pretty worthless. The picture posted is when it’s completely dark outside. I’ll be buying another one for the capped bed of my pick up truck. 3-14-19: Ive bought 4 more of these to brighten up the cargo area of my new Knapheide utility body service van. They did not disappoint. See for yourself in my newest Pic.
customer_reviews.author: Trigger8318

customer_reviews.title: ***BUY WIRED CONNECTORS***
customer_reviews.text: This product worked GREAT! ... but ... invest in the pre-wired connectors if you intend on cutting the strip and want to connect in another place. Soldering did not take to the strip at all which made it nearly impossible to achieve the look I was going for. With some modifications to the supplied "strip to strip" connectors, I was able to complete my project with a slightly higher difficulty level than needed. The product itself is great and worked with the dimmer I already had connected to the existing lighting. You will need to get a dimmable transformer for such application. Lastly you'll need to plan for the size of the connectors when doing your layout
customer_reviews.author: I. Burns

customer_reviews.title: I'm using a 10 vold wall wart to power my string. Plenty of illumination.
customer_reviews.text: if you are like most of us, you probably have a drawer or a box of wall warts that you no longer have use for. Any one of these power supplies will power this LED light string. Just be sure the that the output voltage is less then 12 volts. Lower voltage power supplies will just mean a dimmer light string. I am very happy using a 10 volt supply and will enjoy a longer LED life with the lower voltage. Also be sure the the power supply is capable of putting out at least 1.5 amps (1500 MA).
customer_reviews.author: Jaqomo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price! I installed two rolls of these inside and under my kitchen cabinets. I used an old power 12vdc power supply from a wireless router to power them. This project came out just as good if not better than what I expected. I ended up soldiering wiring to the ends of the strips to connect them and it worked well. I really liked that power can be taken from any cut point to power another strip. The sticky works well too. I cleaned the surface with nail polish remover first to remove any grease and so far I have no problems. I will use these again for another project.
customer_reviews.author: Jep and Cap

customer_reviews.title: Put them up, just to see them hit the floor
customer_reviews.text: Originally a 5 star post, although these are great lights. Super bright easy to put up and make the lighting amazing. Plan to staple/hook/pin these up. Even though they have an adhesive back which seems to be extremely sticky. They were all on the floor in a matter of a few hours!
customer_reviews.author: hayden718

customer_reviews.title: LED lights work great for arcade marquee
customer_reviews.text: I got the LED lights to replace the incandescent bulb that originally came with my arcade cabinet, to back-light the marquee. As you can see from the 'before' pictures, the lighting was not uniform, especially toward the left and right edges of the marquee. I didn't quite use all of the LED light strip, but cut it into 4 3-foot sections spaced about an inch apart. The 3M adhesive worked great, and the lights do not seem to generate any heat. Some comparable LED strips on Amazon come with a dimmer, but that was not important to me. The LED lights were easy to install, and greatly improved the marquee lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Brighter than I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my light arch project after realizing how dim a rbg strip was. One spool was perfect for my 6' wide 3d printed light arch and boy has it lit up my work space! Now I can actually see just how messy it is! I can't wait to use the other spool over my other desks. You can't beat the price for good lighting like this! However, you do need to have your own 12v power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The company rushed me a replacement strip of lights upon learning that my first set arrived damaged. So I've upgraded my rating to reflect the excellent customer service. I intend to use the strip for emergency lighting. I will connect directly to a 12V battery, as needed, and so didn't need a transformer, or remote, or changing colors. This strip emits a clean white light, as stated, and will nicely light up the area around my sump well so I can work there without needing candles/flashlight, leaves both hands free. At this point I would buy again. Waiting to see that they last well.
customer_reviews.author: RobertHarfmann

customer_reviews.title: They worked wonderfully until the strip tore at the base
customer_reviews.text: I stuck the strip down as well as possible but didn’t think to tape the cable in a way that it wouldn’t put any tension on the light strip. Later when I moved the lights, the cable dangling caused the light strip to rip right at the base rendering the entire strip useless... smh. Since this is mostly my own fault, I only took off a star, but this is also a possible design flaw and a very easy mistake to make. Buyer beware! Secure that cable even better than the rest of the strip!
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go around the new vanity as I had seen someone else do with the same vanity I was buying it was not at all what I was expecting they were bright they were great they were Flats but when they're not on it's just this white weird tape eyesore looking out at you so needless to say I went with a more expensive traditional round bowls for my vanity butts these are extremely bright and we're going to use them in our kitchen so still a good buy just not for what I was expecting it to use it for
customer_reviews.author: felicia

customer_reviews.title: Made a thin Lightboard/Table
customer_reviews.text: Made a thin Lightboard/Table with these and could not have been happier. Great bright white light. Wish I had more projects that I could use these on, I want to light up everything with these.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Work great in trailer with dimmer switch
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 3 of these strips as I keep finding uses for them. I use them in an enclosed trailer that we take camping and they work excellent. The adhesive stuck right to the wood overhead in the trailer. I hooked them up to a dimmer switch that I also bought off amazon for a few dollars and with that I can control the brightness because these can be very bright. I have not used a power supply for them, but rather hook them directly to my trailers 12v battery (using a 5 amp fuse for 2 strips). I also use them in my garage and will be purchasing more to use in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for lighting areas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to light up my new safe. Combined with a power supply and motion sensor they work great providing an outstanding automatic lighting system. I used stick pins to hold the light strips in place and only used the adhesive backing on areas around the hinges that were not carpeted. Works and looks great! I got the idea from TWANGnBANG on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: RobKimWill

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT come with a plug in, I purchased separately. I’ll start by saying, I loved the lights they were easy to apply. definitely brighten up the area where there clearly should have been lights. My only fault is with myself, and my choice in color. If you have yellow lights throughout, definitely buy these in yellow. It doesn’t look right with all the lights on, so I will be purchasing it again but this time in yellow!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement
customer_reviews.text: I am using the led strips to replace fluorescent fixtures that are failing. 1/10 the cost of usage. Not exactly the same brightness as a 2x40 fluorescent fixture. But 16 feet long compared to 4 ft long. Great coverage. NO MORE WORRY of glass breakage. NO MORE flickering or failure to fire on. NO MORE bumping my head into the fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Spike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Work great and no complaints for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to light the inside of my 3d printer. They work great for the price and I am happy with them. You get a good amount of lights for the price and they were very easy to work with. I have have them in place for several months with no complaints. Pros - affordable - convenient - easy to install - bright Cons - none at the moment, they have been great
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: These were PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some bright lighting for my DIY vanity project. These were PERFECT!!! The lights are crazy bright, so might take your eyes some adjusting but not an issue. Super easy to install!!! It took me less than 10 mins. I read bad reviews about the tape, my mine was fairly strong and held to my mirror just fine. I did have to fold the tape along the corners of the mirror, but again, not an issue. Including a picture with and without my lights on to show how bright they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great LED strip
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for lighting up a safe with a motion sensor, and also for under kitchen cabinets. So far they have worked great, and I am very happy with my purchase. Had a little issue with the adhesive backing not wanting to stick to the cabinets, but I also didn't do a great job prepping and cleaning where the strip was going. Ended up using some clips to hole them in place. I can't even begin to try and blame that on the light strip though. I would buy these again with no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very bright LED light & good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I received these lights and was disappointed that they did not include an AC Adapter power supply. I did find a used compatible (12v) AC adaptor at my home to use with it. (I think it belonged to a wireless router) I cleaned the bottom of the kitchen cabinets where I wanted to install them and the adhesive part stuck very well. After a week, few bulbs went out in the middle but it wasnt visible in my case, since I have the lights pointing down at my backsplash and countertops. These lights are very bright even during the day and Im happy with them overall.
customer_reviews.author: Nabil

customer_reviews.title: LOW LIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Previous order had plenty of light but this one is weak. Turns out that last order had 5050 leds and this one has smaller 2835 leds. Thought that I was ordering the same thing since I checked reorder but what arrived was not the same and did not figure that out until after installation.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these lights! I used them for my vanity and the lighting is exactly what I was looking for. A little goes a long way. I would buy the entire kit because you need the adapter and base to utilize. My only complaint is that is no switch or button on cord to turn on/off. you have to plug/unplug to turn on.
customer_reviews.author: primesuspect

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, terrible adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I used these to provide edge lighting for a wall mount pc. The lights themselves are great. The adhesive is terrible. When removing the backings the double sided tape pulled off of the lights completely. I ended up using seperate tape to mount. For the price I would buy again, just be aware of the mounting issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Fitzmaurice

customer_reviews.title: Good, just not for task lighting
customer_reviews.text: Great for ambience, but not bright enough for illuminating a task work area that requires good visibility. It's my own fault for not checking the size of the LEDs. I typically buy 5050 for under-counter lighting and for illuminating a room. This is still a great product, just not for task lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cynical

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add a light in the bathroom closet when we remodeled, but I figured a light on the ceiling would be pointless, as only the top shelf would be lit. So I opted to use this around the inside of the door frame, and plugged it into a switch-controlled outlet: fantastic! The adhesive is not super strong, but it is enough to keep it where it needs to be. A very clean, bright white light, and gives the closet a modern look, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright, simple and basic
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought a set of multi colored LED Strip, but the problem was that I had pre-wired my house with 2 conductor cables. Then, i found that it was so much cheaper to buy single-colored LED strips. Surprisingly, the strip was the perfect length for my exact dimension of kitchen cabinetry.
customer_reviews.author: J Lee

customer_reviews.title: Junk. All the stickiness is on the part you pull off
customer_reviews.text: After spending 40 minutes running this through my work truck, getting all the kinks outs... go to pull the backing, and theres ZERO stickiness on the led strip. None. Junk, ripped it all out, money and time wasted. Check your strip before you waste your time
customer_reviews.author: David G

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to light up a small (less than 1 square foot) display case, and am very pleased with the results. The backing sticks well and is reasonably flexible- it will work on far tighter corners than the silicon-coated strip lights, at the cost of not being as weather-resistant. Color is a very sharp, clear white, and they put out a lot of light. As long as your application will keep them dry and safe I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: unknownroad

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive and works well
customer_reviews.text: I use this LED flexible light strip to replace the tiny incandescence light bulbs at the top of the console panel of my Roland Music Atelia AT-80S electronic organ. These light bulbs will eventually burnt out one by one. I removed all 24 light bulbs and replaced them with this LED strip, They would last forever. These are 12 V light bulbs using a 12 AC from the organ. I added a bridge rectifier and convert the 12 V AC to DC for the LED strip. I only need about 54" of the light strip. I also cut about 24 inches and made a music sheet light. This is a very inexpensive for me.
customer_reviews.author: N Li

customer_reviews.title: did not realize I needed a POWER SUPPLY to go ...
customer_reviews.text: did not realize I needed a POWER SUPPLY to go with this when I ordered. I NOW HAVE DONE SO. looking forward to seeing how it works and looks. NOT WATER PROOF IT SAYS ON THE BOX. CANNOT (PROHIBITED) WIND THE LIGHT IT SAYS ON BOX; CUT-ABLE AND LINK-ABLE IT SAYS ON BOX. I hope that helps someone else. I got mine on a LIGHTNING DEAL, so I did read much (or read it thoroughly). I would buy again as I am still curious how this will work/look.
customer_reviews.author: Catsroses

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights and the quality
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because of the faulty strand. Love these lights and the quality. I have strung 4 and I have an issue with one of the strands. It is super bright no matter the setting than the rest of the strands. I don't know if it was a faulty strand or what. I will have to place an replacement order for the first strand. Pictures attached. Otherwise I love the remote control and lighting of this product. Easy to use and install... So much better than the old lighting I had for my crown moldings.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all! This thing is a game changer. 1) Makeup skills escalate because you can ACTUALLY see yourself. It’s insane how this light has changed my face. 2) Instagram famous level mirror selfies. Sounds vain, but it’s 2019. You and I BOTH know you’re taking mirror selfies. Why not make them better? Also it’s survived a big move and stayed attached to my mirror the whole time. Buy this. Trust me. Also don’t forget to buy the adapter things too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lights as a recommendation from a youtuber to make a vanity mirror. Yeah, this was a waste of money. They simply weren't bright enough. Period. Not to mention, they aren't sticky enough, or at least they don't hold. I ended up buying a second roll, to try and double the lights and super glue to hold them in place. That quickly became a diy disaster and I ended up having to throw the whole mirror away. I can not re-interate enough... Don't do it!
customer_reviews.author: KumariAlise w/ Love

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I used this light strip in a glass front curio cabinet. It's small enough to be hidden from view but very bright. I had to cut the strip into sections and solder wire to each section. The copper pads on the cut segments worked very well. Great product for low profile high light applications.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: True daylight white color and very bright !
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great ! Very bright and real daylight white color. I compared them with another LED color lights and I have to say the white color is not as white as this ones, I used them for a Led movie poster box which requires a brigh daylight white led’s and there are the winners!
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Good and bright
customer_reviews.text: These suckers are bright! The tape sticks well if it's on a smooth surface; I put them directly on the glass surface of the mirror. My two problems are that it doesn't come with its own power supply, and I don't know what to do with the rest of the lights. I went around the mirror and cut off what I don't need, but it seems like such a waste. Maybe I'm not being innovative enough, but it doesn't look like I can use the extra...
customer_reviews.author: Ben Couse

customer_reviews.title: Two rolls, different color temperature
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 rolls of daylight white and installed them on a desk/bookshelf that I made. After I stallation I noticed that some shelves were more"yellow" than others. It looks,to me, like the rolls weren't the same color temperature but the packages are marked as the same. The lights, otherwise, work as expected. I'll update if anything changes but so far I am a little dissatisfied with how these turned out. UPDATE: The seller sent me two new rolls of lights and they are both the same color temperature. Now, I just need to go back and remove the existing lights that are too "warm" and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: BrentD

customer_reviews.title: Really like these so far
customer_reviews.text: I put these in a large safe and it was like night and day. I could actually see in the safe all the way to the back. It made a huge difference. Pretty easy to install. Put it in line with a motion sensor, so operation is automatic. Very bright for what I'm using it for. No failures in 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Leo R

customer_reviews.title: I was not satisfied at all with the color accuracy
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised to be daylight white. I was not satisfied at all with the color accuracy, they're very blue just like most other cheap LED lights. I actually purchased the VTC series ribbon LEDs from Yuji LED (a 200 dollar 98 CRI LED ribbon) and have both installed in my office now. The Yuji LEDs are so accurate you can hardly tell the difference between them and natural daylight from the window. These cheap LEDs (hey, they are super cheap!) are nowhere close to daylight regarding. If you want cheap, but these lights, but for sure the CRI is under 80 and the color looks to be around 6500K. Not exactly daylight as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J.

customer_reviews.title: Lit up a 125 gallon aquarium like the big money aquarium lights
customer_reviews.text: I used them to make a homemade aquarium light for my 125 gallon aquarium and they worked well beyond what I expected. I cant judge the adhesive quality that well because I personally adhered them with hot glue for added stability...(it was going over a large tank). They did what they were bought for and the light penetrated the water column well and made my tank look beautiful. I fully plan on purchasing from LE again especially since I have seen they have newer products. Overall an exceptional product for an awesome price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are PERFECT! I use them to add lighting to my 3D printer. I simply cut the length I needed, soldered a wire to them and connected the other end of the wire to the 12V power supply. They are very flexible and stick really well! This provides AMPLE light for my print jobs and I couldn't be happier! Plus, I have a lot left and now I just need to figure out more ways to implement them. So far every light works and I have had absolutely zero issues.
customer_reviews.author: Outbreak

customer_reviews.title: Very bright. Has a traditional under the counter fluorescent ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Has a traditional under the counter fluorescent lighting feel to it. Definitely not warm white though, it's a cold white, slightly blue light. As others have noted, the adhesive backing doesn't hold up, mine started to fall down within a week. Nothing a few well placed staples couldn't fix though. Be careful with the wire connector on the end, it's very fragile. I tore mine off but was able to splice a new one on with the provided snap-fit piece.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Believe it when they saw "not waterproof". I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: Believe it when they saw "not waterproof". I haven't tested it in wet areas, but the backing appears to be paper and I'll bet the whole thing will dissolve if it gets very wet. I'm intending to mount these on the ceiling of my truck canopy (no power adapter required for 12v use) and hope the moisture that sometimes happens there won't affect them, we'll see. A quick test with them on the spool showed a goodly amount of light but they haven't been mounted (I expect to have to glue them up). Seems very cheap, but then they were very inexpensive so /\(^.^)/\
customer_reviews.author: Guargumon

customer_reviews.title: Not the best I have used (2 so far LOL)
customer_reviews.text: I have another set/kit with non standard connectors, doesn't use barrel connectors. It is way better than this one. The lights are okay, pretty bright, the strip is super thin but the adhesion is 3M and STRONG. I kept them, but wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Omadna

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price, great for reflected lighting projects!
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic thing this is!!! Lighting is one of the most expensive things people can throw money at in a house (so to speak). For anybody with a little imagination and ability, a product like this allows you to create custom lighting solutions, which can be much more interesting and beautiful than anything you could buy "off the shelf" at your local home improvement center... and for a mere fraction of what it would cost to do it any other way! I'll be buying more of these, I'm just getting started!!
customer_reviews.author: Sailing Barry

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Installed them in our new office we built instead of 120 volt lighting. Provides the perfect amount of light and no strain because not overly bright. Hooked them to a solar set up so not even using house power. Once we get rest of walls up and ceiling will Make mounts for them. Really like the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: 5cents family

customer_reviews.title: Plenty O Light
customer_reviews.text: There are soooo many uses for these lights. My particular use is to light up a tool box on the bed of my truck. I put it on a magnet switch so it turns on and off automagicly. The sticky tape is good... but don't rely on it. I ran a bead of super glue behind it for more reassurance. The light is plenty bright and doesn't create shadows when I am reaching for tools. Much better than holding a flashlight. The quality of the lights themselves is very good. It is easy to cut them to length and you can even solder multiple strips together. Though it does come with some adapters that do that for you.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Flickering after little to no use - light looks like it's going
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. First time purchaser who used it in several display cases. Unfortunately, after little to no use and a year or so later, one of the strips in one of my cases is flickering. Very disappointing. You may want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A

product_meta.title: LE 12V LED Strip Light, Flexible, SMD 2835, 16.4ft Tape Light for Home, Kitchen, Party, Christmas and More, Non-Waterproof, Daylight White(No Power Adapter)
feature_bullets: Power adapter not includes. If you need one, please search 'LE B019Q3U72M/B00DKSI0S8' on Amazon.

Safe to use. The working voltage is 12V, extremely low heat. Please do not use power adapter that is higher than 12V to supply. The wattage is 18W, Please be kindly informed that the total wattage of LED strip lights should not exceed the max wattage of power adaptor. It is touchable and safe to children.
Easy Installation. Self-adhesive back with adhesive tape for safe and easy application.
Cuttable: DIY various shapes; Good flexibility, it can bend and fold at will. The LED strip lights can be cut every 3 LEDs along the cutting marks, very suitable for easy DIY.

Flexible operations. Slim, compact and flexible PCB strip. Mount end-to-end for bendable or angled patterns, or in continuous rows. Note: The strip light is very fragile. When installing and using, special attention should be paid not to involve and tear.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars6,834 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
